Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: COP 3223C with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Logic design, computer arithmetic, Instruction Set Architecture (MIPS, SPIM simulator), performance, data path, control unit, memory hierarchy, I/O interface.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science
